arts.ttl: Scotland v Denmark: team news, referee details, KO time & where to watch
arts.sum: Scotland face Denmark with a place at the 2026 World Cup on the line. Despite losing to Greece, Steve Clarke’s side have been handed a chance to secure top spot after the careless Danes drew to Belarus in Copenhagen. This means that Scotland are just ninety minutes away from a place at the World Cup Read More

arts.ttl: Scotland vs Denmark Prediction: Can Scots Reach their First Men’s World Cup Finals Since 1998?
arts.sum: After Saturday’s dramatic qualifying action in Group C, Scotland have the chance to reach their first World Cup since 1998. They just need to defeat group leaders Denmark at Hampden Park on Tuesday night to usurp the Danes and steal top spot.
